dialogs.tempInfo: The temperature affects how comfortable your ride will be. Ideal cycling temperatures are between 15-25Â°C. Temperatures outside this range will lower the biking score.
dialogs.windInfo: Wind speed can make cycling more challenging. Ideal conditions are below 3 m/s. Strong winds (>8 m/s) significantly lower the biking score.
dialogs.humidityInfo: Humidity affects how comfortable the temperature feels. Ideal humidity is between 30-60%. High humidity makes warm days feel hotter and can make cycling more strenuous.

weatherError.title: Weather Data Error
weatherError.message: Unable to retrieve complete weather data for this day. This might be due to a connection issue or unavailable data from the weather service.
weatherError.reddit: Please tell me about the error on Reddit in
